text: "If This Is It" is a 1984 song by Huey Lewis and the News. It is the fourth single from their third studio album Sports. It went to number 6 in Canada and the United States, number 8 in Norway, number 10 in Iceland and Sweden, number 20 in Australia, number 37 in New Zealand and number 39 in the United Kingdom. == References == Category:1984 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Huey Lewis and the News songs
title: If This Is It (Huey Lewis and the News song)
